channel.title: How to make yell working just for donators
channel.description: i have tryed much how to make yell command just for donators and i havnt solved how to do it yet.. so plz if u know plz type it here and how to make donators only things etc.

item.title: How to make yell working just for donators
item.dc:creator: @HiddenPker HiddenPker
item.description:
@HiddenPker wrote:

} if(command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 8 && donator >= 1) { String text = command.substring(8); yell("[Donator:"+playerName+"]: " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); }
Hope it helps.

item.title: How to make yell working just for donators
item.dc:creator: @Fight247 Fight247
item.description:
@Fight247 wrote:

if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5 && donator == 1) { String text = command.substring(5); yell("[Donator]: " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); }

Read full topic
item.source: How to make yell working just for donators

item.title: How to make yell working just for donators
item.dc:creator: @Avalon Avalon
item.description:
@Avalon wrote:

if (command.toLowerCase().startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5)
{
    if (donator == 0)
        sendMessage("You must be a donator in order to use the yell function.");
    else if (muted == 1)
        sendMessage("You are muted and may not use this command.");
    else
        PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName + " - "+ command.substring(5);
}

Something along those lines. Obviously you would change the variable donator to whatever you are using to determine whether a player is a donator or not.

Read full topic
